meanings.definition: A rack or shelf for holding books.
meanings.sent1: The school library has colorful bookracks for students to store their books.
meanings.sent2: I organized my collection of novels on the bookracks in my room.
meanings.sent3: The bookracks at the bookstore were so full that they looked like a rainbow of stories.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a bookrack, neatly storing memories and knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The bookracks in the library whispered stories of adventures and mysteries.

meanings.definition: To place books on a rack or shelf.
meanings.sent1: She carefully bookracks her favorite novels to keep them tidy.
meanings.sent2: Every evening, I bookracks the books I used during the day back on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: He bookracks the textbooks in a way that makes them look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The librarian bookracks the new arrivals with precision, creating a welcoming display.
meanings.sent5: As she bookracks the books, she feels a sense of accomplishment and order.
